title: AI Developor/Specialist
job_overview:
We are a company focused on helping digital creators and entrepreneurs scale their businesses using automation, AI, and data-driven workflows. We’re looking for a highly skilled AI Workflow Automation Specialist who can design and implement robust workflows to scrape YouTube videos, generate long-form and short-form scripts, ad copy, website copy, and VSLs. The workflow must dynamically adapt to different niches based on onboarding data for multiple clients.

This is a critical role for building scalable, automated solutions that drive real impact for our clients.

Responsibilities

 • Workflow Design and Automation:
 • Create end-to-end workflows using tools like Make, Apify, Perplexity, and OpenAI to:
 • Scrape YouTube videos based on niche-specific keywords and filters (e.g., low-subscriber channels with high-view videos).
 • Automate the generation of:
 • Long-form and short-form content scripts.
 • Ad copy optimized for various platforms.
 • Website copy tailored to client needs.
 • Video Sales Letters (VSLs) with high conversion potential.
 • Dynamic Niche Switching:
 • Design workflows that adapt to different niches based on an onboarding sheet submitted by clients, pulling relevant data dynamically for each project.
 • Data Extraction and Filtering:
 • Use Apify and Perplexity to scrape and process data from YouTube and other platforms.
 • Implement advanced filtering mechanisms to identify high-performing videos from low-subscriber channels.
 • AI Integration:
 • Leverage OpenAI GPT-4 (or similar models) to generate high-quality, client-specific content.
 • Develop and optimize prompts to ensure generated content aligns with client goals and audience needs.
 • Workflow Optimization:
 • Continuously test and refine workflows to improve accuracy, efficiency, and scalability.
 • Monitor workflow performance and ensure timely execution of tasks.
 • Collaboration and Communication:
 • Work closely with the team to align automation workflows with business objectives.
 • Provide regular updates on workflow progress and performance.

Qualifications

 • Technical Expertise:
 • Proficiency in Make (formerly Integromat) for building and managing complex workflows.
 • Experience with Apify for web scraping and data extraction.
 • Familiarity with Perplexity AI for advanced data queries and research.
 • Strong knowledge of OpenAI GPT-4 for content generation.
 • Content Automation Skills:
 • Proven experience in generating scripts for long-form and short-form content, ad copy, website copy, and VSLs using AI tools.
 • Ability to adapt content tone and style to various niches and client preferences.
 • Problem-Solving and Optimization:
 • Analytical skills to troubleshoot and resolve workflow issues.
 • Creative mindset to optimize workflows for different client needs and scaling demands.
 • Project Management:
 • Ability to manage multiple workflows simultaneously and meet deadlines.
 • Detail-oriented with a focus on delivering high-quality results.
 • Communication:
 • Strong written and verbal communication skills to explain technical concepts and processes clearly.
 • Experience collaborating with cross-functional teams.

Preferred Qualifications

 • Experience in scaling content automation for businesses in the digital product or creator space.
 • Knowledge of YouTube Data API and advanced filtering techniques for identifying high-performing videos.
 • Familiarity with additional automation tools like Zapier, Airtable, or Pabbly Connect.
 • Understanding of SEO, digital marketing trends, and audience engagement strategies.
